divs: Sighting DetailsOBJECT STOPED INFRONT OF SCREEN WINDOWWHERE ME AND MY FAMILY WERE EATING. IT HIT IT HARD BUT NOT ENOUGH TO BREAK IT .IT HOVERED THEIR FOR A FEW SECONDS AND FLEW TOWARDS A NE DIRECTION AND STRAIGHTUP ONCE IT CROSSED THE CREEK. WE ALL RAN OUTSIDE AND OTHER PEOPLE WERE POINTINGUP AT THE SKY. I HAVE ASKED MY FAMILY ABOUT THIS BUT NO ONE RECALLS EXCEPT MYFATHER. THE OBJECT WAS ABOUT THE SIZE OF A BASKETBALL MAYBE A BIT LARGER ANDBROWN OR DARKER.
